original_title: Illegal assets worth over Rs. 100 mn seized during operation ‘Yukthiya’
original_body_lines: The Illegal Assets and Properties Investigation Division of Sri Lanka Police has so far seized assets and land valued at Rs. 45 million and luxury vehicles valued at Rs. 61 million belonging to those engaged in illegal activities during the ongoing operation ‘Yukthiya’, says the Acting IGP Deshabandu Tennakoon.
12.5 perches land with two-story house in Ja-Ela worth Rs. 24 mn
